channel.title: CVE Feed for wp-buy -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wp-buy -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-40695|2024-09-16T20:21:17.800Z -- wp-buy -- seo%20redirection%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20301%20redirect%20manager%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Cross-Site Scripting (CSRF) vulnerabilities in SEO Redirection Plugin plugin <= 8.9 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-23983|2024-09-16T17:18:08.602Z -- wp-buy -- wp%20content%20copy%20protection%20%26%20no%20right%20click%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability leading to plugin Settings Update discovered in WP Content Copy Protection & No Right Click WordPress plugin (versions <= 3.4.4).

item.title: CVE-2023-51484|2024-07-25T14:21:06.459Z -- wp-buy -- login%20as%20user%20or%20customer%20%28user%20switching%29
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in wp-buy Login as User or Customer (User Switching) allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Login as User or Customer (User Switching): from n/a through 3.8.
